p: Although we have only single digit numbers of new patients, there is another challenge in the days ahead. This is the concern about a second wave of the outbreak caused by overseas entrants. In the early part of April 2020, 58.8% of new COVID-19 cases came from aboard. In response, all inbound visitors were required to be tested and self-isolate for two weeks. Emergency clinical trials were underway as of mid-April 2020 to develop new drugs against SARS-CoV-2. Experience and know-how against COVID-19 should be shared to minimize casualties in this global crisis.
